translation.en: I used to look up at space
translation.ja: かつて宇宙には―

translation.en: with hope and wonder in my eyes.
translation.ja: 希望があり 夢があった

translation.en: Until space looked back.
translation.ja: 宇宙人が来るまでは…

translation.en: Invader Zim, evil, alien soldier of the Irken Empire
translation.ja: インベーダー･ジムは アーク帝国(ていこく)の邪悪(じゃあく)な宇宙人だ

translation.en: sent by his diabolical masters, the Almighty Tallest,
translation.ja: トーレスト司令官の命令で 地球にやって来た

translation.en: to infiltrate Earth and prepare it for the coming invasion.
translation.ja: きたる地球侵略(しんりゃく)に備えるため

translation.en: Disguised as one of us,
translation.ja: 人間に姿を変え

translation.en: he moved into my neighborhood,
translation.ja: ボクの近所に住み

translation.en: he went to my school,
translation.ja: 同じ学校に通った

translation.en: and with the help of his vile mechanical servants,
translation.ja: おそまつなロボットを従えて

translation.en: plotted to destroy everything we have,
translation.ja: この星の すべてを破壊(はかい)し

translation.en: - everything we are. - - - And then...
translation.ja: 人間を滅(ほろ)ぼす はずだったが

translation.en: he vanished.
translation.ja: とつぜん消えた

translation.en: My name is Dib Membrane. I'm 12 years old.
translation.ja: ボクはディブ･メンブレーン 12歳だ

translation.en: And I'm all that stands between Zim and the annihilation of our world.
translation.ja: ジムの作戦を阻止(そし)し 地球を滅亡(めつぼう)から救うんだ

translation.en: Prepare your starving, gurgling child- bellies
translation.ja: 腹を空かせて待っている 子供たちよ

translation.en: for the awesome eventuality
translation.ja: ついに 完成したぞ

translation.en: of dinner!
translation.ja: 夕食だー！

translation.en: Foodio 3000 hopes you love what I have made.
translation.ja: フーディオ3000の料理は 大好きですか？

translation.en: Also, what is love?
translation.ja: ところで好きって何？

translation.en: Looks great, Dad. I'm gonna eat that food.
translation.ja: おいしそう　食べていい？

translation.en: Hold up now, daughter!
translation.ja: 待て　娘(むすめ)よ

translation.en: Isn't it time your brother joined us?
translation.ja: ディブは どこだ？

translation.en: Oh, man, no.
translation.ja: 来ないよ

translation.en: Since Zim vanished, Dib's been in his room for, like, a million years.
translation.ja: ジムが消えてから ずっと引きこもってる

translation.en: I hardly recognize him anymore.
translation.ja: 前とは別人みたいだ

translation.en: He just sits there in that chair getting grosser...
translation.ja: イスに座りっぱなしで どんどんキモく クサくなってる

translation.en: smellier.
translation.ja: どんどんキモく クサくなってる

translation.en: He sure does, but try to be more understanding.
translation.ja: まあな でも理解してあげなさい

translation.en: Dib's finally letting go of his silly obsession
translation.ja: やっと受け入れたんだ

translation.en: with aliens and ghosts and all his other non- scientific nonsense.
translation.ja: 宇宙人やオバケなど 存在しないってことをな

translation.en: And it's not easy for him.
translation.ja: つらいと思うぞ

translation.en: Imagine if you stopped believing in, oh, video games.
translation.ja: テレビゲームが まぼろしだったら どうだ？

translation.en: Don't even joke about that, Dad.
translation.ja: そんなの笑えない

translation.en: Honey, letting go of silly ideas is just part of growing up.
translation.ja: バカな考えを捨てることは 大人への一歩だ

translation.en: Why, as a child, I thought sharks were my friends.
translation.ja: パパも昔は サメを友達だと思ってた

translation.en: I know better now.
translation.ja: でも今は ちがうぞ

translation.en: So, try to be more supportive. He's your brother, after all.
translation.ja: 兄さんなんだ 支えてあげなさい

translation.en: Okay, Dad.
translation.ja: わかったよ　んもう

translation.en: Hey, Dib! Dad says come to dinner!
translation.ja: ディブ！　夕食の時間だよ

translation.en: You know I can't leave my post, Gaz.
translation.ja: ボクは ここから動けない

translation.en: Just shove the food in here.
translation.ja: 料理を こっちへ

translation.en: Where's the shoving stick? I can't shove without the shoving stick.
translation.ja: そっちに置くための棒を 取ってこなきゃ

translation.en: Zim's still out there, Gaz, so I have to wait
translation.ja: ジムは現れるぞ ボクが見張るしかないんだ

translation.en: and watch.
translation.ja: ボクが見張るしかないんだ

translation.en: No one else will. They could never see the truth.
translation.ja: だれも真実に気付かない

translation.en: Why, though? Brainwashing?
translation.ja: なぜ？ 洗脳か　心理操作か？

translation.en: Mind control?
translation.ja: 洗脳か　心理操作か？

translation.en: Brain- erasing ghosts?
translation.ja: オバケが記憶(きおく)を消したのか？

translation.en: Nobody believes me now, but I'll make them see.
translation.ja: でも必ず世界に気付かせる

translation.en: I'll expose Zim to the world, and open humanity's eyes
translation.ja: ジムの本当の姿を見れば みんな信じるはず

translation.en: to the danger they were in all along.
translation.ja: 地球は危機に直面していると

translation.en: Even Dad, world- famous man of science will say,
translation.ja: パパもだ 偉大(いだい)な科学者でも 認めるだろう 偉大(いだい)な科学者でも 認めるだろう 〝ファンのみんな ありがとう！ メンブレーン博士〞

translation.en: I believe you, Dib.
translation.ja: 〝ファンのみんな ありがとう！ メンブレーン博士〞 〝ファンのみんな ありがとう！ メンブレーン博士〞 〝おまえを信じよう 疑って悪かった〞

translation.en: I'm sorry I ever doubted you.
translation.ja: 〝ファンのみんな ありがとう！ メンブレーン博士〞 〝おまえを信じよう 疑って悪かった〞

translation.en: That's the worst Dad impression ever,
translation.ja: 全然 パパに似てない

translation.en: but, Dib, let it go.
translation.ja: それより もう諦(あきら)めなよ

translation.en: Zim's been gone a long time,
translation.ja: ジムは ずっと消えたままだ

translation.en: and as far as you know, he might just be gone for good.
translation.ja: 永遠に帰ってこないかも

translation.en: I'd be willing to bet that Zim will never, ever...
translation.ja: 断言してもいい ジムは二度と 絶対に…

translation.en: Oh, wait, there he is.
translation.ja: 現れた

translation.en: It's Zim!
translation.ja: ジムだ！

translation.en: He's back! And he's doing stretches!
translation.ja: 帰ってきた ストレッチしてる

translation.en: Nobody stretches like that unless they're warming up for evil!
translation.ja: 悪いことをする前ぶれだ

translation.en: This is it! The...
translation.ja: やったぞ！ ボクは…

translation.en: moment I've been...
translation.ja: この時を… うっ…

translation.en: waiting for!
translation.ja: 待っていた

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.ja: 何してんの？

translation.en: Gotta get to Zim!
translation.ja: つかまえに行くんだ ジムを！

translation.en: Dib, no. Look at you.
translation.ja: ちょっと　やめなよ

translation.en: The world's not ready to see what you've become.
translation.ja: そんな姿で外に出るの？

translation.en: You're hideous!
translation.ja: キモすぎる

translation.en: The smell!
translation.ja: 〝うんち缶〞 〝うんち缶〞 クサっ！

translation.en: needs me!
translation.ja: 救うんだ

translation.en: - Take a bath first! -
translation.ja: まずは おふろに…

translation.en: Take...
translation.ja: うっ

translation.en: Take a bath!
translation.ja: 体を洗って

translation.en: No!
translation.ja: 来るなー！

translation.en: Zim!
translation.ja: ジム！

translation.en: Yes, it is I, and-- Hmm?
translation.ja: ああ　オレさまだ それと…

translation.en: - Oh, wait, sorry. -
translation.ja: 待てよ

translation.en: You'll have to move along, hideous goblin. I'm posing dramatically for when the Dib shows up.
translation.ja: 悪いが どいてくれ ディブを待ってるんだ

translation.en: - I am Dib. - What?
translation.ja: ディブだよ

translation.en: - Give me a sec here. - We know each other.
translation.ja: 待てよ… 忘れたの？

translation.en: - - I've been expecting you, Dib!
translation.ja: 待っていたぞ ディブ！

translation.en: I can tell. You set up sprinklers and everything.
translation.ja: そうみたいだね　いい演出だ

translation.en: - - You can't prove anything!
translation.ja: 証拠(しょうこ)はない！

translation.en: - Anyhow, I-- - Where have you been, Zim?
translation.ja: さてと さがしたぞ ジム

translation.en: I've been monitoring your house, the school, that taco place you love so much.
translation.ja: 家も学校もタコス店も 見張ってた

translation.en: No, no. GIR loves that place. I think it's dirty.
translation.ja: タコスが好きなのはガーだ

translation.en: - I ate a baby there. - He did.
translation.ja: 赤ちゃんウマい そうさ

translation.en: What have you been up to, Zim?
translation.ja: 今まで何をしてたんだ？

translation.en: Phase one of my evil plan, human.
translation.ja: 邪悪(じゃあく)な作戦のパート１さ

translation.en: Phase one.
translation.ja: パート１だ

translation.en: Computer! Laugh with me!
translation.ja: 笑え コンピューター

translation.en: I don't want to.
translation.ja: イヤです

translation.en: You've been in your house sitting in the toilet all this time?
translation.ja: ずっと自宅のトイレで 座ってたの？

translation.en: - Yes. - Like, the whole time?
translation.ja: ああ 今まで ずっと？

translation.en: That's right.
translation.ja: そう

translation.en: Did you have to sit in the toilet?
translation.ja: なんでトイレに？

translation.en: Do not try to understand the ways of my people, Dib!
translation.ja: 聞くな！ 宇宙人のことを 理解しようとするな

translation.en: From the moment my mission began
translation.ja: オレさまが 地球で任務を始めてから―

translation.en: on this horrible planet, you've been there,
translation.ja: オレさまが 地球で任務を始めてから― おまえは ずっと 鼻の上のタンコブだった

translation.en: haunting my every move like a squak in my shmoopsquizz.
translation.ja: おまえは ずっと 鼻の上のタンコブだった

translation.en: - A what in your huh? - Uh- huh!
translation.ja: 何の？

translation.en: And while the rest of your kind were easily fooled,
translation.ja: 他の人間は 簡単に だませたのに

translation.en: you were able to see through my brilliant disguise.
translation.ja: おまえはオレさまの 完ぺきな変装を見破った

translation.en: Martha!
translation.ja: 大変だぞ　マーサ！

translation.en: - Eh? - The neighbor boy's an alien!
translation.ja: あいつ 宇宙人だ

translation.en: Never mind, Martha.
translation.ja: いや 人間だった

translation.en: - He's normal. - Okay.
translation.ja: いや 人間だった そうね

translation.en: I knew if I vanished for long enough,
translation.ja: 予想どおりだな

translation.en: you'd just watch and wait,
translation.ja: オレが姿を消せば―

translation.en: your neglected body growing smelly - and useless. -
translation.ja: おまえは見張りを続けて 体をボロボロにする

translation.en: But that was only Phase One of my evil plan.
translation.ja: これは邪悪(じゃあく)な作戦の パート１に過ぎない

translation.en: Well, keep watching, Dookie- Dib. Watch helplessly as I begin...
translation.ja: その動けない体で ただオレを見てるがいい

translation.en: Phase Two!
translation.ja: パート２の始まりだ！

translation.en: - Hah! - No!
translation.ja: ほら！ やめろ

translation.en: I'm switching people's mail around.
translation.ja: 郵便物が ごちゃ混ぜ

translation.en: That's illegal. No!
translation.ja: 犯罪だぞ やめろ～！

translation.en: I'm reading someone's newspaper. I don't pay for a subscription.
translation.ja: だれかの新聞を タダで読んでやる

translation.en: Nobody reads newspapers anymore, but, no, stop!
translation.ja: 新聞は時代遅(おく)れだけど やめろ！

translation.en: Minimoose, get in on this mayhem!
translation.ja: ミニムース　やっちまえ

translation.en: That's my mom's pizza sticker. She is crazy for pizza.
translation.ja: これ ママのステッカーよ ピザが大好きなの

translation.en: Hey, what... what are you... Hey, that... that's...
translation.ja: 待って　何するの

translation.en: Hey, don't... Wait.
translation.ja: ちょっと…

translation.en: Don't! Don't!
translation.ja: やめて ダメよ

translation.en: Don't!
translation.ja: やめてったら

translation.en: Excellent.
translation.ja: さすがだ

translation.en: Me! Me! Let me do one.
translation.ja: 次はボク～ 見ててね

translation.en: I launched that pug into space.
translation.ja: パグを宇宙に飛ばしたよ

translation.en: - I thought you liked that pig. -
translation.ja: 友達だろ？

translation.en: - Why I do that? - What's the matter, human?
translation.ja: そうだった 何してる　止めないのか？

translation.en: Why aren't you stopping me?
translation.ja: 何してる　止めないのか？

translation.en: Can't fight back.
translation.ja: 戦えない

translation.en: Sat too long.
translation.ja: 長く座りすぎた

translation.en: Chair fused to butt.
translation.ja: イスにくっついてる

translation.en: More chair than man now.
translation.ja: ボクはイスになった

translation.en: Humans are such fragile, goopy things.
translation.ja: 人間って弱っちいな

translation.en: No Irken would ever become a chair.
translation.ja: アーク星人とは大ちがい

translation.en: Wait! Was that Phase Two?
translation.ja: 待て　これがパート２？

translation.en: Of course it was!
translation.ja: もちろんだ

translation.en: Probably. Uh...
translation.ja: たぶんな

translation.en: You know what? Now I'm not sure.
translation.ja: さて どうだったか…

translation.en: Either way, you're helpless to stop me, Chair- Dib.
translation.ja: どっちにしろ イスには止められない

translation.en: So long!
translation.ja: じゃあな

translation.en: Welcome home, son.
translation.ja: おかえり 息子よ

translation.en: Zim!
translation.ja: ジムー！

translation.en: Excellent work, me.
translation.ja: さすがだ オレ！

translation.en: All is going according to plan, but there's still much to do, GIR.
translation.ja: すべて予定どおり だが まだ仕事は多いぞ

translation.en: Yes, sir!
translation.ja: リョーカイ！

translation.en: Computer?
translation.ja: コンピューター

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何です？

translation.en: Open a connection with the Almighty Tallest, my leaders and biggest fans.
translation.ja: オレのボスでファンの トーレスト司令官と通信しろ

translation.en: Preparing to call The Tallest.
translation.ja: 通信します

translation.en: You see, GIR, The Tallest--
translation.ja: トーレストは…

translation.en: Now calling The Tallest!
translation.ja: 呼び出し中　ガルルルル

translation.en: The Tallest haven't heard from me,
translation.ja: 通信は久しぶりだ

translation.en: their greatest and most incredible invader, in a very long time.
translation.ja: 偉大(いだい)なインベーダーが 長いこと音信不通なら―

translation.en: - They'll be sick with worry. -
translation.ja: 心配してるはず “トーレスト”

translation.en: Hey, remember Invader Zim?
translation.ja: なあ ジムって覚えてる？

translation.en: - Who? - Zim.
translation.ja: だれ？ チビのジムだよ

translation.en: Tiny?
translation.ja: チビのジムだよ

translation.en: Screamed a lot?
translation.ja: うるさいヤツ

translation.en: The guy that sends us the donuts?
translation.ja: ドーナツをくれた？

translation.en: No, that's Invader Jim. He's great.
translation.ja: ちがう　あれはジミーだ いいヤツ

translation.en: Oh, wait. Zim.
translation.ja: 思い出した　ジムね

translation.en: - We hate him! - Yeah, that's him.
translation.ja: イヤなヤツ！ そうそう

translation.en: Remember the time we lied and told him we were sending him on a secret mission to Earth,
translation.ja: 極秘任務だと言って 地球に行かせたけど

translation.en: but really we were just getting rid of him because he's awful?
translation.ja: ただの厄介払(やっかいばら)いだったろ？

translation.en: Yeah. We're hilarious.
translation.ja: ああ　オレたちひどいな

translation.en: My Tallest, there's an incoming transmission.
translation.ja: トーレスト司令官 通信要請(ようせい)です

translation.en: Yep, life's been pretty great ever since Zim vanished for good.
translation.ja: ああ ジムが消えてから 人生はサイコーだ

translation.en: Anyhow, send that transmission through.
translation.ja: まあいい　通信を受けろ

translation.en: I wonder who it could ever be.
translation.ja: 相手は だれだ？

translation.en: It is I, Zim!
translation.ja: ジムです！

translation.en: My Tallest, you will be overjoyed to know
translation.ja: 司令官 お喜びください

translation.en: Phase One of my most ingenious plan to prepare Earth for your arrival was a success.
translation.ja: 地球侵略(しんりゃく)に備える作戦の パート１が成功しました

translation.en: Zim, we thought you were dead.
translation.ja: ジム　死んだはずでは？

translation.en: Could a dead Zim do this?
translation.ja: 死んだジムは こんなことできません

translation.en: Sirs,
translation.ja: 我らの敵はイスになりました

translation.en: my Earthly arch- nemesis is now a sad chair,
translation.ja: 我らの敵はイスになりました 〝人間のディブ〞 我らの敵はイスになりました 我らの敵はイスになりました 〝イスのディブ〞

translation.en: leaving me free to complete
translation.ja: 〝イスのディブ〞 〝イスのディブ〞 これで心おきなく 次の作戦に進めます

translation.en: the most diabolical phase of my plan,
translation.ja: これで心おきなく 次の作戦に進めます

translation.en: Phase Two,
translation.ja: パート２です

translation.en: wherein I, uh...
translation.ja: これから…

translation.en: Computer, put them on hold. Oh, no.
translation.ja: 保留にしろ パート２が何だったか 思い出せない

translation.en: I really can't remember what Phase Two is.
translation.ja: パート２が何だったか 思い出せない

translation.en: I must have sat in that toilet too long.
translation.ja: トイレに座りすぎた

translation.en: Think, Zim. Think.
translation.ja: 思い出せ ジム

translation.en: We don't care, Zim.
translation.ja: どうでもいいぞ

translation.en: Why didn't I write it down?
translation.ja: メモしておけば…

translation.en: Wait! Computer,
translation.ja: そうだ　コンピューター

translation.en: play back any recordings of me discussing Phase Two.
translation.ja: パート２の話をした時の 録画を見せろ

translation.en: One recording found.
translation.ja: １件です

translation.en: Would you like me to record any and all mention of Phase Two?
translation.ja: パート２についての話を 録画しますか？

translation.en: No, thank you. Zim forgets nothing.
translation.ja: いらない　ジムは忘れない

translation.en: Hmm, besides reminding me how cool I look and sound, that was of no help.
translation.ja: カッコよく撮(と)れてるが 作戦は思い出せない

translation.en: He knows we can still see and hear him, right?
translation.ja: 通信中だって気付いてる？

translation.en: I liked when he was dead.
translation.ja: 死んでほしい

translation.en: I remember Phase Two!
translation.ja: パート２ 覚えてるよ

translation.en: You do? Good work, GIR! Tell me.
translation.ja: 本当か？ いいぞ　教えろ

translation.en: You gonna order a million pizzas,
translation.ja: ピザを たくさん頼(たの)むんだ

translation.en: and then I gotta roll around in them pizzas,
translation.ja: ピザの上をゴロゴロしたら

translation.en: and that's the story about how I turn into a giant pizza.
translation.ja: ボクが巨大ピザに 変身できるって話だよ

translation.en: This isn't the time for the giant pizza story, GIR.
translation.ja: 巨大ピザの話はするな

translation.en: And that will never happen!
translation.ja: 注文しないぞ！

translation.en: Silence! I need to think! Just calm down and...
translation.ja: 静かに　考えさせろ！

translation.en: Computer, did you put The Tallest on hold?
translation.ja: コンピューター 保留にしたか？

translation.en: - Nope. -
translation.ja: いいえ

translation.en: I don't think they heard anything.
translation.ja: 聞こえたかな

translation.en: Yes, they did.
translation.ja: うん 聞こえたね

translation.en: I am Irk's finest Invader.
translation.ja: 帝国(ていこく)一のインベーダーが―

translation.en: If The Tallest find out I failed to dominate the Earth because I forgot Phase Two,
translation.ja: 作戦パート２を忘れたなんて 知られたら…

translation.en: who knows what they'll do?
translation.ja: 大変なことに

translation.en: Invader Zim,
translation.ja: インベーダー・ジム

translation.en: you were once our best, most amazing Invader,
translation.ja: かつては帝国(ていこく)一の インベーダーだったが―

translation.en: but now, you're dumb.
translation.ja: 今のおまえはアホだ

translation.en: Also, stupid.
translation.ja: そしてバカ

translation.en: As punishment, you will be stripped of your Invader rank, re- encoded as nothing.
translation.ja: おまえはインベーダー失格だ 無意味な存在になれ

translation.en: But you can't! I am Zim!
translation.ja: やめろ　オレはジムだ

translation.en: Control Brains, re- encode.
translation.ja: 脳を書きかえろ！

translation.en: Re- encoding.
translation.ja: 書きかえ中

translation.en: It is done, My Tallest.
translation.ja: 完了(かんりょう)です　トーレスト司令官

translation.en: Zim, you will live out
translation.ja: ジム おまえは今後

translation.en: the rest of your long, sad days as--
translation.ja: おまえは今後 悲しく長い人生を…

translation.en: - - Wait, no, never mind.
translation.ja: そう来たか

translation.en: GIR, time is of the essence.
translation.ja: ガー　時間がないぞ

translation.en: - The Tallest could be here any day now... - ...and Dib won't stay a chair forever.
